title: Random black artifact in client
body:
since last patch I get quite often this peculiar bug, which displays black (empty) texture in client, which is often over useful information.[](https://imgur.com/a/JiqWQ)

any idea what to do with it?

replies.body: This could either be bad game files, or even a connection problem that can't download assets properly.  If it's always in the same spot, I recommend downloading our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to see if a repair can help with this.

It's always over whole area. Interesting is that interactive elements always load up once I move cursor over them.
I will try that repair tool
